deal_number.description: The unique identifier for the transaction. Mentioned in the 'ID' column

buy_sell.description: The type of transaction. Mentioned in the 'Direction' column

volume.description: The volume of the transaction. Mentioned in the 'Quantity (mmbtu)' column

price.description: The price per unit involved in the transaction. Mentioned in the 'Price($)' column

amount.description: The monetary amount involved in the transaction. Mentioned in the 'Amount USD $' column

pipeline.description: Pipeline used for delivery of the gas. Mentioned in the 'Description' column. Consider the entire value of the column as the pipeline name.
